title: Hallway Chats - Sharing stories and building belonging

Hallway Chats





Toggle Menu
























Everybody has a story. Her story, his story, their story, and our stories are powerful tools for building connections between the diverse individuals that have become the WordPress community. Through Hallway Chats, Topher DeRosia and Nyasha Green aim to dig into and share the stories of this wonderful community.
 



 



Episode 167 – A Chat With Iolanda Sequino

April 27, 2023April 27, 2023 



Topher and Iolanda got some time at WordCamp Italy in Milan to chat about her experiences in WordPress.





				Read More Episode 167 – A Chat With Iolanda SequinoContinue
 








 



Episode 166 – A Chat With Maja Benke

April 13, 2023April 13, 2023 



Topher and Maja got some time to sit at an outdoor cafe in Barcelona Spain and talk about how she got into WordPress.





				Read More Episode 166 – A Chat With Maja BenkeContinue
 








 



Episode 165 – A Chat With Lesley Sim

March 23, 2023April 9, 2023 



Topher and Nyasha had the opportunity chat with Lesley Sim about life before WordPress, free diving, and founding a company.





				Read More Episode 165 – A Chat With Lesley SimContinue
 








 



Episode 164 – A Chat With Alice Orrù

March 11, 2023March 11, 2023 



Topher had the opportunity chat with Alice Orrù while at WordCamp Italia in Milan this last November.  Alice is Italian, but lives in Spain.





				Read More Episode 164 – A Chat With Alice OrrùContinue
 








 



Episode 163 – A Chat With Tom Finley

March 9, 2023March 11, 2023 



Topher and Nyasha have a great conversation with Tom on topics ranging from art, design, and artificial intelligence.





				Read More Episode 163 – A Chat With Tom FinleyContinue
 








 



Episode 162 – A Chat With Vassy Valchanova

January 20, 2023January 16, 2023 



Topher and Vassy meetup for a live, in-person Hallway Chat at WordCamp Europe 2022 and talk about her work in Digital Marketing.





				Read More Episode 162 – A Chat With Vassy ValchanovaContinue
